text: Herviella africana is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella africana Edmunds, 1970. Accessed on 2018-02-18. ==Distribution== This species was described from Tanzania. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1970
title: Herviella africana
